ca.ualberta.cs.c301f13t13.backend

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ca.ualberta.cs.c301f13t13.backend.DBHelper

  • public class DBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Purpose: Creates and sets up the database to be used using the information about the database provided in the contract class (DbHelper). Also keeps the tables updated. Design Pattern: Singleton
    Author:
    Ashley Brown, Stephanie Gil

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DBHelper getInstance(Context context)
      Gets a new instance of DbHelper.
      void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
      Sets up the tables.
      void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db, int oldVersion, int newVersion)
      Deletes the tables and recreates them for an update.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DBHelper getInstance(Context context)
        Gets a new instance of DbHelper. If one already exists, returns that one. I.e. DbHelper is a singleton.
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        DbHelper Citing: Idea to make this class a singleton as well as the code for the getInstance() is from: URL: http://www.androiddesignpatterns.com/2012/05/correctly-managing-your-sqlite-database.html When: September 17, 2013 Author: ALEX LOCKWOOD License: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5

      • onCreate

        Sets up the tables.

      • onUpgrade

             int oldVersion,
             int newVersion)
        Deletes the tables and recreates them for an update.
